author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Khao galli on NH9 at Vivanta by TajTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Khao galli on NH9 at Vivanta by Taj
Vivacious ambience, encompassing hospitality and an eye-catching array of scrumptious Indian delicacies marks a typical Saturday evening at Viva, the all-day dining at Vivanta by Taj, Begumpet. The menu at Khao Galli boasts of an elaborate affair with robust flavours, where everything from Jhal Muri to Jalebi, Aloo Paranthas to Kheema Pav are all available under one roof!
Authenticity is the hallmark of this festival! Khao Galli is specially curated by the Executive Chef Arun Kumar Reddy and his team of experts to tantalize the taste buds of their patrons, and bring to their platters the best of Indian Street Food. The scrumptious spread is paired to perfection with exotic desserts and unlimited brew and cocktails.
With our finest culinary connoisseurs whipping up positively delectable appetizers and mains, suited to your palette, Chole Bhatura, Pav Bhaji, Chowmein and Tale hui machi are amongst the many main course dishes that would grace your plate, whilst you stroll around our live paratha, chat, dessert and kebab counters. The meal is concluded with the perfect combination of cutting Irani chai and Osmania Biscuits.
Come revel with us at Vivanta by Taj, Begumpet and experience the locale food off all your favorite quaint streets of India!
Source:- Vivanta by Taj
